title.narrative: Ethiopia Protection of Basic Services Program Phase II Project

description.narrative: The Development Objective of the Ethiopia Protection of Basic Services Program Phase II Project (PBS II) is to contribute to expanding access and improving the quality of basic services in education, health, agriculture, water supply and sanitation, and rural roads delivered by sub-national governments, while continuing to deepen transparency and local accountability in service delivery.

condition.narrative: Conducat follow-up study of Financial Transparency and Accountability
Conduct a Mid-Term review of the project
Conduct a Procurement Audit
Conduct a Procurement Audit
Conduct a Public Expenditure and Financial Accountability Assessment
Conduct a procurement audit
Conduct an Environmental Sustainability Study of LIG
During Project implementation, the Recipient shall ensure that at least 6 joint Budget and Aid Reviews are carried out. First JBARno later than June 30, 2009
Eighth JBAR in October/November 2012
Fith JBAR in April-May 2011
Fourth JBAR in October-November 2010
OFAG to audit, on a continuous basis, samples of regions and LAs that receive funds under Subprogram A(i) and A(ii) and submitquarterly summaries within 60 days of end of each EFQ.
PBS Social Accountability plan for roll-out approved by Steering Committee
Prepare semi-annual project reports and submit within 3 months after end of six-month period
Recruit additional staff to PBS Unit, EMCP, BOFEDs, MOH, PPAs and PFSA
Second JBAR in October-November 2009
Seventh JBAR in April/May 2012
Starting 3 mos after effectiveness, collect, compile and submit annually, reports on status of compliance with ESMF, RPF, and EMPsand RAPs, if any
Submit not later than 45 days after end of Ethiopian fiscal quarter (EFQ) for Subprograms A(i), A(ii), and B, interim unauditedfinancial reports for the project covering such quarter
Submit not later than 75 days after end of Ethiopian fiscal quarter (EFQ) for Subprograms C and D, interim unaudited financialreports for the project covering such quarter
Submit not later than 90 days after end of Ethiopian fiscal quarter (EFQ). quartterlky expenditure reports for Subprograms A(i),A(ii).
The Recipient shall have its financial statements audited covering the period of one EFY, and submit to IDA not later than 6monthsafter end of such period
Third JBAR in April-May 2010
